name: Cheaters Cheat, Snitches Snitch
description:
Finals week has arrived, all students study hard in order to pass the exams. And of course, there are always people who want to take the easy way out. Will the teachers  be able to catch all the cheaters? Or will the cheaters make their way through this game of cat and mouse? Oh and don’t forget, amongst the students, there are also snitches who are best friends with the teachers…

This is an online card game that is good for 5 players. The game file and rule book is available for download. 

playingcards.io page: https://playingcards.io/eyp6m5
